TopicTitle: There are unnecessary trees/bodies of water under the KSC

Articles.Content:
There are unnecessary trees scattered underneath the Kerbal Space Centre with bodies of water. This will negatively impact the performance while at the launchpad or near the KSC.

 You can view the screenshot here: https://imgur.com/a/Hb3BLmH
The screenshot was taken by clipping the camera through the ground at the runway.
I've seen these during an aircraft crash. Definitely water under there.

2 hours ago, WhoopsThatExploded said:

I've seen these during an aircraft crash. Definitely water under there. 

This is not the only place I have seen that has unnecessary water underneath the surface, it usually happens on land masses near the sea.
